title: Oni Joushi Wa Nise Kareshi!?
alternative_title: Fake Boyfriend: Knocked-Out by My Harsh Boss ; 鬼上司は偽彼氏！？ 溺甘すぎてノックダウン寸前ですっ
status: Fake Boyfriend: Knocked-Out by My Harsh Boss ; 鬼上司は偽彼氏！？ 溺甘すぎてノックダウン寸前ですっ
description:
Description :
        [OFFICIAL SUMMARY FROM MANGAPLAZA] "...Do whatever you want. Just don't come crying to me." When he plays with her wet and sensitive spot... as he looks at her with a fiery passion, she won't be able to last long! Honoka is a 28-year-old office worker in a long-standing stationery maker from the countryside who is bothered by her slightly girlish looks. She's continued to flee from her parents begging her to get married, but now her mother is saying she's going to bring her a potential suitor... In an effort to prevent their meeting, Honoka's former college upperclassman and totally intimidating boss Kosuke has agreed to pretend her boyfriend. Although he's a ball-buster at work, he shows her a softer side. Kosuke was supposed to only be her fake boyfriend... but now he's pampering her and showering her with love...?+
